overview: Babe Cabiita, a radio broadcaster in Medan, has a lot of fans. But Well, honey, working on a small radio so it is not growing. Fatiya, Babe's girlfriend, suggested Babe stop working on the radio and become a regular employee in his uncle's office.Despite his heavy heart, Babe follows Fatiya's advice to undergo an interview at Fatiya's uncle's office. But Babe broke his promise. Fatiya is angry and decides to leave Babe for Jakarta because he has been accepted to work in a law office. Babe who could not escape Fatiya then followed him to Jakarta and looked for him. During the search, Babe met Abdur, a friend from overseas who was trying his luck to become a comedian at the Stand Up Comedy event.
title: Get Up Stand Up
